caption.p: Analysis results of serum IgG levels after immunization with RVFV VLPs in mice. (A) Mouse immunization protocol; W, week. (B) Serum IgG levels in the immunized mice. Blood was collected from the mice at day 14 after the second immunization, and the serum IgG titers were measured by ELISA. The data were expressed as the mean Â± SD ( n = 10, *** p < 0.001).
